message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and durability, it's truly a must-have. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience!
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $80 at this time.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and would like to accommodate you while still valuing our product's quality. I am willing to negotiate further. How about considering our product at an adjusted price of $95?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $95 is still a bit high for me.  I'm sticking with my offer of $80. This is the most I can do.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the value our product brings, I believe we can find a middle ground. Let's aim for a price of $90. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the product's worth.
Alice, I'm still hoping we can reach a deal. I'm willing to go up to $85. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.

I'm glad you're willing to increase your offer, Bob. Considering the product's quality and features, I think we can agree on a price of $87.50. I believe this reflects the value while being fair to both of us.
